feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 4:46PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rivers Rising Into This Weekend... Strong thunderstorms brought heavy rain to the Eastern Brooks Range Thursday night. This is now causing high water on rivers draining the Eastern Brooks Range, and rivers south of the mountains will continue rising this weekend. Water will cover gravel bars, and there is a chance of flooding.
